title: Valance, 1750–1775
medium:
Medium: cotton, linen
Technique: resist printed, indigo dyed
description: Long white valance resist printed in two shades of blue. Pillar design with foliage at the top. Two figures of naked boys clinging to pillar rendered in light blue. Between pillars are large flowers on a vine. Design is incomplete. Piece is bound on three sides with narrow tape printed in blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Valance, 1750–1775. Medium: cotton, linen
Technique: resist printed, indigo dyed. Gift of Mrs. Rudolph Fleugge. 1965-49-1.
